select t1.id, t1.table_name, t1.schema_name, t1.table_size, t1.table_total_size, t1.table_comment, t2.tec_owner_user_name, t2.busi_owner_user_name, t1.table_last_modify_time, t1.table_last_access_time
from table_meta_info t1 join table_meta_info_extra t2 on t1.schema_name = t2.schema_name and t1.table_name = t2.table_name
